pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linkage Using Diagnosis Codes // Probabilistic record linkage without direct identifiers using only diagnosis codes. Method is detailed in: Hejblum, Weber, Liao, Palmer, Churchill, Szolovits, Murphy, Kohane Cai (2019) doi: 10.1038/sdata.2018.298 ; Zhang, Hejblum, Weber, Palmer, Churchill, Szolovits, Murphy, Liao, Kohane Cai (2021) doi: 10.1093/jamia/ocab187.
